attributes.additional_details: As a 17 year old, not only have I experienced, but I have also witnessed the devastating impacts of COVID 19 restrictions on people’s lives. Most young people hardly suffer from the disease - to the point where people need to be tested to see if they have it rather than experiencing dangerous symptoms. Why are restrictions in place for people who aren’t impacted by the disease and are craving for life to go back to normality. We are missing out on non-returnable years of life.
attributes.background: People in the country are starting to feel elements of life are being taken away from them due to restrictions. The rules must be reconsidered so those who feel unsafe can isolate and will receive support. However, people who would like to return to normality can while understanding the risks.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
